document.full_text: new york governor andrew cuomo on wednesday announced a new contract with a law enforcement union and urged much larger public employee unions to accept the same terms or risk nearly 10,000 layoffs.
document.title: new york governor gets one labor accord, but truce unlikely
lines_and_colors: new york governor andrew cuomo on wednesday announced a new contract with a law enforcement union and urged much larger public employee unions to accept the same terms or risk nearly 10,000 layoffs.
